movie.title: Hell Ride
movie.description_intro: Two rival bikers gangs, the Victors and the Six-Six-Six's, refuel their decades-old rivalry.
movie.description_full: Two rival bikers gangs, the Victors and the Six-Six-Six's, refuel their decades-old rivalry.

movies.title: White Sands
movies.summary: A small southwestern town Sheriff finds a body in the desert with a suitcase and five hundred thousand dollars. He impersonates the man and stumbles into an F.B.I. investigation.
movies.description_full: A small southwestern town Sheriff finds a body in the desert with a suitcase and five hundred thousand dollars. He impersonates the man and stumbles into an F.B.I. investigation.
movies.synopsis: A small southwestern town Sheriff finds a body in the desert with a suitcase and five hundred thousand dollars. He impersonates the man and stumbles into an F.B.I. investigation.

movies.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
movies.summary: Buffy Summers (Kristy Swanson) has the lifestyle any young woman could want. Cheerleading, dating the Captain of the basketball team, and copious amounts of time spent shopping with friends. She had no idea of her true calling until a mysterious man named Merrick (Donald Sutherland) approached her and told her that she is the Slayer; one woman called to defend the world from vampires. Reluctant to concede to the fact, Buffy soon learns that Merrick speaks the truth and so begins to take her new life seriously while trying to maintain the sense of normality her life had once been. With her best friends slowly abandoning her, Buffy finds solace in the town outcast, Pike (Luke Perry), who knows very well the terrors that have arisen. Together, they combat the forces of the old and powerful vampire, Lothos (Rutger Hauer), who has his eyes set on Buffy.

movies.title: The Last Shift
movies.summary: Stanley's last shift at his fast food job takes an unexpected turn when he befriends a young African-American work employee.
movies.description_full: Stanley's last shift at his fast food job takes an unexpected turn when he befriends a young African-American work employee.

movies.title: Sarah Cooper: Everything's Fine
movies.summary: A variety special full of issues of politics, race, gender and class. Sarah will also be joined by special guests.
